property.name: name
property.value: River Town

property.name: onCollide
property.value: teleport('world1/overworld.tmx', 25, 31)

property.name: onCollide
property.value: teleport('world1/overworld.tmx', 25, 31)

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('Before the portals in Hero opened, this town used to be at war with most of its neighbors.')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('I tried to visit the Airseed Shrine once, but I couldn\'t find a way over the mountains.')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('The governor lives in this house. Be polite!')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('Welcome to the river city! It\'s a hard journey to come south over the mountains.')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('A pub can be a good place to find information... or just a good drink.')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('The robots that hail from beyond Hero are amazing. They gain the power of items equipped to them.')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('The swamps south of here can be tricky to traverse. I don\'t think any have been down that way in years.')

property.name: hide
property.value: return getSwitch('opening_flashback')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('Now that Hero is sealed off, this town is the most active trading hub on the continent.')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('Once in a while a shop might have a relic from Hero, but magical items are rare nowadays.')

property.name: onCollide
property.value: teleport('world1/overworld.tmx', 25, 31)

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('Here in the river city we built a shrine to the airseed, a magical artifact that lets you breathe where others suffocate.')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('The champion of the plains town wields the everburning torch, a magical weapon that gives off light even without air.')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('In the city keep of the mountain town, their wiseman guards the magus eye, a magical talisman that guides the user away from invisible traps.')

property.name: onInteract
property.value: speak('A man named David stopped by here a few weeks ago. I hear he had one of the four artifacts that unseal Hero!')

property.name: onCollide
property.value: targetTele('world1/rivertown_interior.tmx', 'inn')

property.name: onCollide
property.value: targetTele('world1/rivertown_interior.tmx', 'shops')

property.name: onCollide
property.value: targetTele('world1/rivertown_interior.tmx', 'pub')

property.name: onCollide
property.value: targetTele('world1/rivertown_interior.tmx', 'house')
